name: The Child of Blair
description:
The Child of Blair is a short horror game, its the second part of the Blair series (officially its the thirth but im ignoring Blair the horror game for now). In this game you are a explorer who after experiencing what happened in the cellars of blair wants the government to burn the place down, however due to lack of evidence they don't. And so you return there to get the evidence needed. But things take a turn...

THE GAME HAS GAMEPLAY OF ABOUT 30 MINUTES (If played Perfectly)

HOW TO PLAY:

The night is devided into hours (12pm until 6 am). you have to survive the night. Every hour your location and progress will be saved and can be played furthur later on. There are 3 monsters to survive, you have:

Blair - She often starts singing which means she starts to run after you, just run until you hear the singing again and you'ill live.

The Child - You'ill see a noise appear on the screen, quickly stop doing moving untill the noise stops

The Smile - Will appear on your flashlight, turn it off and keep it off for a while (6- 10 seconds)

If you have any advice about what i should change feel free to share it in the comments, and have fun playing!
